text: Hey <!group>, I hate to be the person that won’t stop reminding you about things, but don’t forget about the potluck on Wednesday! Most everyone has signed up to bring something tasty. As always, let me know if you have questions or need suggestions!
what extent of infrastructure will be there? should I bring my own serving utensils? trivet? signage?

good question <@U026PT0D7>! Your own serving utensils would be ideal. I’m sure we could scrounge up something if you forget, but finding 25 serving utensils will be difficult. We’ll probably set up on the short tables, if your dish needs a landing spot, that should come too.
signage could be on a an as-needed basis. I would guess most things would be fairly easy to identify, but please speak up if you disagree!
